actions.comment: when a player leaves, destroy all units owned by that player

then.comment: start respawn timer (it goes from 0 to 100)
give wood to the owner of last attacking unit (player is the owner of a unit)
give stone to the owner of last attacking unit (player is the owner of a unit)

actions.comment: last casting unit belongs to whoever pressed a key (player is the owner of a unit)

settings.menudiv: Simple Hunt and Gather Game. Players can move using WASD or Arrow keys and open shop by pressing B. To drop / pick up resources G / E.
